entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .Net Maui 7 self signed certificates not work #14555
  • PickPhotoAsync Zoom, Align and Crop #14554
  • Image wrong name causing error for android build #14550
    Backlog
  • Maui Android: If keyboard is on the page scroll not working #14548
  • Grid layouts are not working as they did in 7.0.59 (Windows) #14537
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Multiple issues in iOS CollectionView selection synchronization #14535
    Backlog
  • "Pair to Mac" in Visual Studio 2022 not working when Mac is behind proxy with authentication #14534
  • text on button disappear ,UI prolem #14533
    Backlog
  • MAUI: Could not compile native assembly file: environment.arm64-v8a.ll #14531
  • AppInfo.VersionString and AppInfo.BuildString incorrect when ApplicationDisplayVersion and ApplicationVersion read from files #14528
    Backlog
  • Splash Screen has a black frame around the logo - even when forced to white #14527
  • UI components not filling parent container #14526
  • Maui blazor 7.0.81 Windows Error #14525
  • ApplicationVersion parameter to dotnet build no longer works #14524
  • 7.0.81 Service Release 4 breaks CascadeInputTransparency #14522
    Backlog

Closed

  • MAUI XAML build error when using Data Template and binding #14425
  • Fresh MAUI app #14512

PullRequests

Created

  • readme spelling correction #14556
    community ✨
  • Update DEVELOPMENT.md to include information about solution files #14553
  • Dont propagate nav event if not appeared #14552
  • [Android] Properly remove the Frame's border thickness #14551
    backport/suggested
  • [xaml] fix x:Array and x:Double in Release mode #14546
    area/Xaml </>
  • Added ICommandMapper for extension methods #14545
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebView from 7.0.4 to 7.0.5 #14544
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Google from 7.0.4 to 7.0.5 #14543
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.Web from 7.0.4 to 7.0.5 #14542
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook from 7.0.4 to 7.0.5 #14541
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Update CollectionView changing ItemsLayout #14532
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
  • Propagate Navigation Events through PageContainer #14523

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization from 7.0.4 to 7.0.5 #14540
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.MicrosoftAccount from 7.0.4 to 7.0.5 #14539
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.JSInterop from 7.0.4 to 7.0.5 #14538
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Windows] Allow early use of DeviceDisplay.Current.MainDisplayInfo #14521
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞
  • [net7.0] Windows apps do not need GUIDs (remove check) #13034
    area/single project ☝️, backport/suggested, backport/approved
  • Code generation now supports internal duplicate types #14171
    area/Xaml </>

Updated

  • [net7.0] Make MAUI into a workload based on NuGet packs #14331
    area/setup 🪄
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #14381
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix Entry issues with Keyboard using IsPassword #14382
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • [iOS] Fix focus issues with DatePicker and TimePicker #13321
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Fix issue using FillRule with Paths #14493
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Make Benchmarks.Droid runnable as APK for perf testing #14447
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [controls] fix memory leak in `CollectionView` #14329
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix gestures in Label Spans #14410
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Android] Allow to override WebViewClient on Android WebView #14321
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Core] Fix Border margin issue #14402
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Apply different brushes by state (Normal, PointerOver, etc) #10782
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Switch to AppWindowTitleBar From SetTitleBar #14517
